noticia:
A recent announcement from Strive, also known as $ASST, reveals plans to raise up to 150 million dollars through a follow-on offering of its SATA preferred stock. The funds will be used to retire convertible debt, purchase more Bitcoin, and support corporate needs.

The move is likely aimed at consolidating Strive's position in the market while also reducing financial burdens. This development could have significant implications for the overall crypto landscape.

Data source: Bitcoin Magazine
